info.title: Product Master Data Including Classification â€“ Read
info.description: Product master is a reusable set of data describing a product or service. Using the API you can read product master data, class assignment and characteristic valuation.

x-sap-shortText: Read the master data for products including class assignment and characteristic evaluation with this synchronous inbound service

get.summary: Returns procurement data.
get.description: Returns procurement data of product master record for a plant.
